conversations.content: I want to buy two items: a laptop and a mouse. Please ensure the total cost does not exceed $1,500.

<|Function_Thought|>
To accommodate the user's request for buying a laptop and a mouse, I will first search for available products for each item. I need to ensure that the total cost does not exceed $1,500 after both items are added. I will initiate the first search for a "laptop".
<|/Function_Thought|>

<|Final_Answer|><|/Final_Answer|>

<|Function_Call|>[search_product(product_name="laptop")]<|/Function_Call|>
